column6: a white male fell off his motorcycle suddenly and without warning. An ambulance was called but the victim was already dead.------Mr. Deng Sino
column8: said that the victim was identified as Jordan Michael Rex
column9: a 52-year-old male from the United States who was living at a 120H house on 17Bet Street in Saum Kosal 5
column11: Meanchey district.------The preliminary cause of death was given as fainting
column12: which made him fall from the motorcycle.------Warning
